remarks:
Lemma for ~ ltmul1 .  Multiplication of both sides of 'less than' by a positive number.  Theorem I.19 of [Apostol] p. 20.  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.) 

---

 Multiplication of both sides of 'less than' by a positive number.  Theorem I.19 of [Apostol] p. 20.  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement: ltmul1a $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ ( C e. RR /\ 0 < C ) ) /\ A < B ) -> ( A x. C ) < ( B x. C ) ) $.
